thread.title: Carolyn Sargent

author: Carolyn Sargent
title: Carolyn Sargent
text: I am having such a wonderful time being a house sitter. I have the opportunity to interact with beloved pets and am meeting loving and caring pet owners. So far, I have just looked for locations where I already have friends. House sitting gives me the opportunity to see and visit with them without being dependent or imposing upon them - a very nice arrangement for all. I will eventually branch out to locations where I can see new things and experience different cultures, with the best part being falling in love with the animals for whom I am caring.
